level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-204, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-2091.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353, § 308, made a technical correction in the repeal of this section by D.C. Law 16-205, § 3(b).

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 5 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act. See 8A Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
